snippet.title: World Cup design challenge
snippet.description: In the run-up to the FIFA world cup, ZDNet Australia asked Web designers to submit their proposals for the World's greatest Soccer Web site. This is what they came up with.

snippet.title: Aust developers vie for mock World Cup honours
